description_txt: stated on September 19, 2012 in remarks in Atlanta:
quote_txt: "Redistribution" has "never been a characteristic of America."

description_txt: stated on September 13, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Even today part of Romney’s fortune is invested in China."

description_txt: stated on September 10, 2012 in a website post.:
quote_txt: "Tim Kaine doubled down in his support of devastating defense cuts, saying the ‘the deal was the right thing to do.’"

description_txt: stated on August 17, 2012 in an interview with Evan Smith on “Overheard,” premiered Sept. 6, 2012:
quote_txt: "I am going to be on the ballot in all 50 states. There is no other third-party candidate that’s going to come close to achieving that."

description_txt: stated on September 17, 2012 in an interview with Townsquare Media New Jersey:
quote_txt: Says "if we do nothing and continue to let Obamacare siphon off that $700 billion dollars off the top of it, Medicare goes away in less than 10 years -- certain accounts of it -- and it just falls apart at the seams."

description_txt: stated on September 19, 2012 in an election flier :
quote_txt: "Since President Obama took office, over 88,000 Ohio workers have lost their jobs."

description_txt: stated on September 13, 2012 in in a TV ad:
quote_txt: "Seven times Obama could have stopped China's cheating. Seven times, he refused."

description_txt: stated on September 6, 2012 in an op-ed in 'The Hill':
quote_txt: "President Obama has no plan to reduce the deficit, let alone pay down the debt."

description_txt: stated on September 17, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: "Under Obama, families have lost over $4,000 a year in income."

description_txt: stated on September 11, 2012 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says Romney and Ryan "both backed proposals that would outlaw abortions even in cases of rape or incest."

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2012 in press release:
quote_txt: "Since 2000, only 10 cases of in-person voter fraud have been proven nationally."

description_txt: stated on September 7, 2012 in a television interview:
quote_txt: Based on the August 2012 national jobs numbers, "for every person who got a job, nearly four people stopped looking for a job."

description_txt: stated on September 4, 2012 in a news release:
quote_txt: "The president went on a stimulus-fueled spending binge that stuck every American man, woman and child with a $50,000 share of this $16 trillion debt."

description_txt: stated on May 17, 2012 in a surreptitiously recorded speech to donors at a fundraiser:
quote_txt: The "48, 49 percent" that supports President Barack Obama are "people who pay no income tax."

description_txt: stated on May 17, 2012 in remarks at a campaign fundraiser:
quote_txt: "Forty-seven percent of Americans pay no income tax."

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2012 in in a news conference:
quote_txt: "The Providence Economic Development Partnership . . .which you [Cicilline] chaired, loaned $103,000 in taxpayer funds to one of your campaign workers. The worker never paid back the loan."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2012 in an online post:
quote_txt: "Portland Schools spend $500K to deem PB&J sandwiches racist."

description_txt: stated on May 17, 2012 in a private campaign fundraiser:
quote_txt: "Fifty percent of kids coming out of school can't get a job."

description_txt: stated on May 17, 2012 in a private campaign fundraiser:
quote_txt: Says President Obama promised "he'd keep unemployment below 8 percent" if the stimulus passed.

description_txt: stated on September 18, 2012 in a web post:
quote_txt: Says U.S. Rep. John Barrow "left taxpayers on the hook for $950k study on genetic makeup of ants."

description_txt: stated on September 5, 2012 in an interview on The Daily Rundown:
quote_txt: Says when Mitt Romney was governor, Massachusetts was 47th in job creation

description_txt: stated on September 13, 2012 in an Enterprise Florida meeting:
quote_txt: The significant drop in Florida’s unemployment rate is a good economic sign.

description_txt: stated on September 12, 2012 in a campaign commercial:
quote_txt: Says he "will protect your guaranteed benefits" in Medicare while "Mitt Romney would take away Medicare as guaranteed benefits."

description_txt: stated on September 6, 2012 in an email :
quote_txt: An aide "acted on his own" and "was not representing the Thompson campaign" when he sent an email criticizing the sexual orientation of U.S. Senate candidate Tammy Baldwin.

description_txt: stated on September 4, 2012 in a blog:
quote_txt: "Sen. Bob Menendez voted to enact a new tax on the sale of homes of 3.8%."

description_txt: stated on September 4, 2012 in a campaign email:
quote_txt: Says  Sherrod Brown’s campaign attacked Josh Mandel’s military service

description_txt: stated on August 14, 2012:
quote_txt: Medicare "premium support" backed by Republican vice presidential candidate Paul Ryan "is not vouchers."

description_txt: stated on September 2, 2012 in an interview with The Daily News Journal of Murfreesboro:
quote_txt: Defends his vote to push "retirement age to 70" by saying he is for "a process" that would not be fully implemented until "around the turn of the century."

description_txt: stated on September 2, 2012 in an appearance on "A Lively Experiment.":
quote_txt: David Cicilline is "the 5th most liberal person in the House of Representatives."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • September 17, 2012

description_txt: stated on August 29, 2012 in a TV ad:
quote_txt: Says Republican U.S. Rep. Sean Duffy "voted against paying our soldiers" and "against increasing combat pay" while voting "to protect his own pay."
